meanings.sent1: The postdepositional layers of sediment were added on top of the existing ones.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the postdepositional changes in rock formations to understand their history.
meanings.sent3: The postdepositional surprises in the soil made the archaeologists rethink their excavation strategy.
meanings.sent4: Her postdepositional insights into the painting revealed hidden details.
meanings.sent5: The postdepositional patterns in the sand were like nature's own artwork.

meanings.definition: Relating to processes or changes that occur after deposition
meanings.sent1: The postdepositional analysis revealed new information about the fossilization process.
meanings.sent2: Understanding postdepositional weathering helps in predicting future landscape changes.
meanings.sent3: The postdepositional dance of the leaves in the wind was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent4: His postdepositional approach to problem-solving was innovative and effective.
meanings.sent5: The postdepositional effects of time were evident in the worn-down statue.
